subLabels.text: (a)  principles and philosophies  of founding fathers

descriptions: Emphases should be on Hetherington, Dudley Sergent, Thomas Wood and

subLabels.text: (a)   nationalism and patriotism in physical education and sport
descriptions: Emphases should be on Hetherington, Dudley Sergent, Thomas Wood and John Dewey
Students should be taught on how physical education and sports will enhance achievement of nationalism, patriotism and  national ideologies.
Differences between work, rest, recreation, leisure and sports should be emphasized
Candidates should be able to differentiate between indoor and outdoor recreation.
The role of recreational activities in the life of an individual and the society should be emphasized. Safety in recreational activities should be mentioned.

subLabels.text: Swimming, cycling, playing musical instruments, table tennis, camping etc
(d)  differences between recreational activities and lifetime

descriptions: Differences between intramural and extramural activities, minor and major games and sports should be emphasized.
The role of lead up games and games of low organization should be mentioned. Advantages and disadvantages of each type of tournament.

Reference should be made to the origin and significance of these festivals. The origin and importance of the Olympic Games to the social and political life of the ancient Greek should be discussed. Emphasis to be placed on Sparta and Athens.

subLabels.text: History of all africa games reasons for disparity in the timing of the games history and activities of supreme council of sports in african (scsa)
Main parts and functions of the human skeleton
descriptions: Emphasis should be on history, organization and the governing body of each of the competition. It should be noted that all sports federation have their own international competition and should be stated

subLabels.text: The brain the spinal cord the nerves
descriptions: Candidates should be able to name the main parts of the human skeleton
Candidates should be able to list the main bones involved in movement of all the joints. Joints that permit different kinds of movement should be discussed.
The parts and functions of each organ listed should be discussed.  The simple reflex action should be discussed.

subLabels.text: The hearts muscle effects of exercise on the heart the blood circulation function of blood types of blood circulation
descriptions: Internal and external respiration should be emphasized
Aerobic and anaerobic activities in relation to respiration should be discussed.
Name and locations of major muscles should be emphasized

subLabels.text: The trachea, lungs and nose the functions types of respiration aerobic and anaerobic sports
descriptions: Isotonic and isometric contraction should be emphasized.

subLabels.text: Description of the various body type relationship between body type and physical activities and sports

descriptions: Safety precaution involved in each game should be discussed.
Candidates should be able to draw and label standard courts/playing areas and equipment. terminologies in each game should be explained.
Duties of officials in each game should be discussed. The application of the rules and regulations should be discussed Skills in each game should demonstrate and practised

subLabels.text: Definition of physical fitness components of physical fitness physical fitness examples of health related and performance/skill related components of physical fitness benefits of physical activity, exercise and physical fitness
descriptions: Candidates should be able to draw and label standard court and playing areas and demonstrated the skills involved in each game.
The application of the rules and regulations should be discussed. Teachers should demonstrate coaching points emphasized. Pupils should practice. Game situation should be encouraged.

subLabels.text: Importance of health in physical education care of the body sportswear
descriptions: Qualities of good health should be mentioned.
The importance of keeping the body clean before, during and after exercise should be emphasized.
The importance of selecting appropriate sportswear for difference sports and games should be emphasized.
Reference should be made to the effect of good and bad sportswear on the body.
Emphasis should be on pre-game nutrition role of carbohydrate in sports

subLabels.text: Classes of food nutrients balanced diet dietary consideration in sports
descriptions: Emphasis should be placed on: Stimulants, narcotics, hallucinogen, sedatives and ergogenic aids.

subLabels.text: Meaning of drug types of drug drug use and misuse the effect of drug on sports performance
And solutions that require first aid
descriptions: Candidates should be able to identify kinds of sports injuries and explain the causes, symptoms, management and prevention of each injury.
Candidates should be able to define and apply first aid to sports injury.  They should also be able to list the contents of a first aid box.

subLabels.text: Definitions categories of people with special needs corrective exercise activities for the special needs social and emotional problems of the special needs
descriptions: Pupils should be made aware of the use, care and maintenance of sportswear. The role of sportswear in regulating body temperature before, during and after exercise should be discussed.
The management for each of these should be discussed.
The different types and application of artificial respiration should be discussed.
The need for safety precautions in physical education should be discussed.
Administrative chart and organogram at different institutional levels should be emphasized.

subLabels.text: Structure/functions of sports at national, regional/state and local government level
